short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrainMimic knows what you want to say and does the typing for you with just a click, no prompting needed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brain Mimic is a browser extension that allows you to add content from your email, Slack, or any site. Using this data, you can generate grounded email or Slack responses in one click, with no additional prompting needed.
